title: Remote Hybrid Fundamentals of Physiology Mastery Program

context.prior_knowledge: High school-level foundational knowledge in life sciences
context.additional_context: A physiology fundamentals competency enhancement course for medical device/pharmaceutical field professionals, combining real-time video collaboration and mobile learning

learning_goals: Learners can explain the basic operating principles of major human body systems (circulatory, respiratory, and nervous systems)
Learners can discuss physiological phenomena with peer learners using simulation tools and collaborative platforms
Learners complete over 85% of 10-minute microlearning modules via mobile-based learning and achieve over 70% scores in real-time quizzes
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
